Quote.Author: Ivanka Trump
Quote.QuoteValue: I always envisioned myself having a traditional and elegant wedding

Quote.Author: Iyanla Vanzant
Quote.QuoteValue: All things are lessons that God would have us learn

Quote.Author: Iyanla Vanzant
Quote.QuoteValue: Pain is pain, hurt is hurt, fear is fear, anger is anger, and it has no color

Quote.Author: Iyanla Vanzant
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm really not that fierce

Quote.Author: Iyanla Vanzant
Quote.QuoteValue: All of us have ways in which we mask and cover our pain

Quote.Author: Iyanla Vanzant
Quote.QuoteValue: Comparison is an act of violence against the self

Quote.Author: Iyanla Vanzant
Quote.QuoteValue: Everyone has something that blocks us from the full experience and expression of our nobility

Quote.Author: Iyanla Vanzant
Quote.QuoteValue: People say I've had a difficult time in life. I think I've had an exciting time in life

Quote.Author: Iyanla Vanzant
Quote.QuoteValue: The show is 'Fix My Life!' Get it? Life. I do not fix people

Quote.Author: Iyanla Vanzant
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm focusing on healing lives and teaching people that they can heal - giving them tools to heal

Quote.Author: Iyanla Vanzant
Quote.QuoteValue: I grew up in the Holiness Church, where prayer was an event

Quote.Author: J. Cole
Quote.QuoteValue: I feel like this: Whatever is in your path and in your heart, you need to do

Quote.Author: J. Cole
Quote.QuoteValue: Anything I do, I want to do it well

Quote.Author: J. Cole
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always been an underdog. I feel like I beat the odds

Quote.Author: J. Cole
Quote.QuoteValue: My fans love me for me, my beats, my rhymes

Quote.Author: J. Cole
Quote.QuoteValue: I still wanna rap better than everybody else, and I wanna say important things

Quote.Author: J. Cole
Quote.QuoteValue: I had a lot of resistance, and not just to fame. I was always conscious of not changing

Quote.Author: J. Cole
Quote.QuoteValue: You can't reverse fame. You can lose all the money, but you'll never lose people knowing you

Quote.Author: J. Cole
Quote.QuoteValue: No rapper in the world from Jay-Z to Tupac to Biggie has 100 percent love on everything they do

Quote.Author: J. Cole
Quote.QuoteValue: I kinda like the idea of having an album that's all me

Quote.Author: J. Cole
Quote.QuoteValue: I was a huge Mike Tyson fan growing up; his fights were always on in my house

Quote.Author: J. K. Rowling
Quote.QuoteValue: Never trust anything that can think for itself if you can't see where it keeps its brain

Quote.Author: J. K. Rowling
Quote.QuoteValue: It is our choices... that show what we truly are, far more than our abilities

Quote.Author: J. K. Rowling
Quote.QuoteValue: If you want to see the true measure of a man, watch how he treats his inferiors, not his equals

Quote.Author: J. K. Rowling
Quote.QuoteValue: Anything's possible if you've got enough nerve

Quote.Author: J. K. Rowling
Quote.QuoteValue: The internet has been a boon and a curse for teenagers

Quote.Author: J. K. Rowling
Quote.QuoteValue: I would like to be remembered as someone who did the best she could with the talent she had

Quote.Author: J. K. Rowling
Quote.QuoteValue: It does not do to dwell on dreams and forget to live

Quote.Author: J. K. Rowling
Quote.QuoteValue: I sometimes have a tendency to walk on the dark side

Quote.Author: J. K. Rowling
Quote.QuoteValue: Indifference and neglect often do much more damage than outright dislike

Quote.Author: J. K. Rowling
Quote.QuoteValue: What's coming will come and we'll just have to meet it when it does

Quote.Author: James A. Baldwin
Quote.QuoteValue: The most dangerous creation of any society is the man who has nothing to lose

Quote.Author: James A. Baldwin
Quote.QuoteValue: People are trapped in history and history is trapped in them

Quote.Author: James A. Baldwin
Quote.QuoteValue: Love takes off masks that we fear we cannot live without and know we cannot live within

Quote.Author: James A. Baldwin
Quote.QuoteValue: To be a Negro in this country and to be relatively conscious is to be in a rage almost all the time

Quote.Author: James A. Baldwin
Quote.QuoteValue: To act is to be committed, and to be committed is to be in danger

Quote.Author: James A. Baldwin
Quote.QuoteValue: Those who say it can't be done are usually interrupted by others doing it

Quote.Author: James A. Baldwin
Quote.QuoteValue: The world is before you and you need not take it or leave it as it was when you came in

Quote.Author: James A. Baldwin
Quote.QuoteValue: Love him and let him love you. Do you think anything else under heaven really matters?

Quote.Author: James A. Baldwin
Quote.QuoteValue: Be careful what you set your heart upon - for it will surely be yours

Quote.Author: James A. Baldwin
Quote.QuoteValue: Anyone who has ever struggled with poverty knows how extremely expensive it is to be poor

Quote.Author: Jane Austen
Quote.QuoteValue: There is nothing like staying at home for real comfort

Quote.Author: Jane Austen
Quote.QuoteValue: There is no charm equal to tenderness of heart

Quote.Author: Jane Austen
Quote.QuoteValue: To sit in the shade on a fine day and look upon verdure is the most perfect refreshment

Quote.Author: Jane Austen
Quote.QuoteValue: Selfishness must always be forgiven you know, because there is no hope of a cure

Quote.Author: Jane Austen
Quote.QuoteValue: Friendship is certainly the finest balm for the pangs of disappointed love

Quote.Author: Jane Austen
Quote.QuoteValue: Life seems but a quick succession of busy nothings

Quote.Author: Jane Austen
Quote.QuoteValue: To be fond of dancing was a certain step towards falling in love

Quote.Author: Jane Austen
Quote.QuoteValue: Think only of the past as its remembrance gives you pleasure

Quote.Author: Jane Austen
Quote.QuoteValue: In nine cases out of ten, a woman had better show more affection than she feels

Quote.Author: Jane Austen
Quote.QuoteValue: We have all a better guide in ourselves, if we would attend to it, than any other person can be

Quote.Author: Jay-Z
Quote.QuoteValue: Belief in oneself and knowing who you are, I mean, that's the foundation for everything great

Quote.Author: Jay-Z
Quote.QuoteValue: The average rap life is two or three albums. You're lucky to get to your second album in rap!

Quote.Author: Jay-Z
Quote.QuoteValue: I think relationships are broken up because of the media

Quote.Author: Jay-Z
Quote.QuoteValue: I love what I do, and when you love what you do, you want to be the best at it

Quote.Author: Jay-Z
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm far from being god, but I work god damn hard

Quote.Author: Jay-Z
Quote.QuoteValue: Your job is to inspire people from your neighborhood to get out

Quote.Author: Jay-Z
Quote.QuoteValue: I was never a worker. And that's not even being arrogant. I was just never a worker

Quote.Author: Jay-Z
Quote.QuoteValue: My first album didn't come out until I was 26

Quote.Author: Jay-Z
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't sit around with my friends and talk about money, ever. On a record, that's different

Quote.Author: Jay-Z
Quote.QuoteValue: No, I'm not interested in politics. I have zero interest. I have interest in hope and people

Quote.Author: Jeff Bezos
Quote.QuoteValue: If you can't tolerate critics, don't do anything new or interesting

Quote.Author: Jeff Bezos
Quote.QuoteValue: Life's too short to hang out with people who aren't resourceful

Quote.Author: Jeff Bezos
Quote.QuoteValue: You don't want to negotiate the price of simple things you buy every day

Quote.Author: Jeff Bezos
Quote.QuoteValue: My view is there's no bad time to innovate

Quote.Author: Jeff Bezos
Quote.QuoteValue: I believe you have to be willing to be misunderstood if you're going to innovate

Quote.Author: Jeff Bezos
Quote.QuoteValue: I think the definition of a book is changing

Quote.Author: Jeff Bezos
Quote.QuoteValue: What's dangerous is not to evolve

Quote.Author: Jeff Bezos
Quote.QuoteValue: It's not an experiment if you know it's going to work

Quote.Author: Jeff Bezos
Quote.QuoteValue: Part of company culture is path-dependent - it's the lessons you learn along the way

Quote.Author: Jeff Bezos
Quote.QuoteValue: If you don't understand the details of your business you are going to fail

Quote.Author: Jesus Christ
Quote.QuoteValue: Do not let your hearts be troubled. Trust in God; trust also in me

Quote.Author: Jesus Christ
Quote.QuoteValue: And know that I am with you always; yes, to the end of time

Quote.Author: Jesus Christ
Quote.QuoteValue: I am the Way, the Truth, and the Life. No one comes to the Father except through me

Quote.Author: Jesus Christ
Quote.QuoteValue: A new command I give you: Love one another. As I have loved you, so you must love one another

Quote.Author: Jesus Christ
Quote.QuoteValue: For what shall it profit a man, if he gain the whole world, and suffer the loss of his soul?

Quote.Author: Jesus Christ
Quote.QuoteValue: Let the one among you who is without sin be the first to cast a stone

Quote.Author: Jesus Christ
Quote.QuoteValue: Blessed are the merciful, for they will be shown mercy

Quote.Author: Jesus Christ
Quote.QuoteValue: Blessed are the meek, for they will inherit the earth

Quote.Author: Jesus Christ
Quote.QuoteValue: As the Father has loved me, so have I loved you

Quote.Author: Jesus Christ
Quote.QuoteValue: All my authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me

Quote.Author: Jim Rohn
Quote.QuoteValue: Happiness is not something you postpone for the future; it is something you design for the present

Quote.Author: Jim Rohn
Quote.QuoteValue: Discipline is the bridge between goals and accomplishment

Quote.Author: Jim Rohn
Quote.QuoteValue: Take care of your body. It's the only place you have to live

Quote.Author: Jim Rohn
Quote.QuoteValue: Either you run the day or the day runs you

Quote.Author: Jim Rohn
Quote.QuoteValue: If you don't like how things are, change it! You're not a tree

Quote.Author: Jim Rohn
Quote.QuoteValue: If you are not willing to risk the unusual, you will have to settle for the ordinary

Quote.Author: Jim Rohn
Quote.QuoteValue: Whatever good things we build end up building us

Quote.Author: Jim Rohn
Quote.QuoteValue: The walls we build around us to keep sadness out also keeps out the joy

Quote.Author: Jim Rohn
Quote.QuoteValue: You cannot change your destination overnight, but you can change your direction overnight

Quote.Author: Jim Rohn
Quote.QuoteValue: Effective communication is 20% what you know and 80% how you feel about what you know

Quote.Author: Joel Osteen
Quote.QuoteValue: When you focus on being a blessing, God makes sure that you are always blessed in abundance

Quote.Author: Joel Osteen
Quote.QuoteValue: God made you a masterpiece - be blessed, secure, disciplined and equipped

Quote.Author: Joel Osteen
Quote.QuoteValue: If you want to reap financial blessings, you have to sow financially

Quote.Author: Joel Osteen
Quote.QuoteValue: Faith is about trusting God when you have unanswered questions

Quote.Author: Joel Osteen
Quote.QuoteValue: If you don't set the tone for the day, the devil will set it for you

Quote.Author: Joel Osteen
Quote.QuoteValue: Sometimes God will deliver you from the fire, and other times God will make you fireproof

Quote.Author: Joel Osteen
Quote.QuoteValue: Let go of yesterday

Quote.Author: Joel Osteen
Quote.QuoteValue: I like sports, and I enjoy playing basketball and lifting weights

Quote.Author: Joel Osteen
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not for gay marriage, but I'm not for discriminating against people

Quote.Author: Joel Osteen
Quote.QuoteValue: A good thing to remember is somebody's got it a lot worse than we do

Quote.Author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
Quote.QuoteValue: He is happiest, be he king or peasant, who finds peace in his home

Quote.Author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
Quote.QuoteValue: The soul that sees beauty may sometimes walk alone

Quote.Author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
Quote.QuoteValue: Behavior is the mirror in which everyone shows their image

Quote.Author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
Quote.QuoteValue: Correction does much, but encouragement does more

Quote.Author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
Quote.QuoteValue: All theory, dear friend, is gray, but the golden tree of life springs ever green

Quote.Author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
Quote.QuoteValue: Knowing is not enough; we must apply. Willing is not enough; we must do

Quote.Author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
Quote.QuoteValue: A man's manners are a mirror in which he shows his portrait

Quote.Author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
Quote.QuoteValue: Magic is believing in yourself, if you can do that, you can make anything happen

Quote.Author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
Quote.QuoteValue: Personality is everything in art and poetry

Quote.Author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
Quote.QuoteValue: Love does not dominate; it cultivates

Quote.Author: John C. Maxwell
Quote.QuoteValue: A leader is one who knows the way, goes the way, and shows the way

Quote.Author: John C. Maxwell
Quote.QuoteValue: People may hear your words, but they feel your attitude

Quote.Author: John C. Maxwell
Quote.QuoteValue: The secret of your success is determined by your daily agenda

Quote.Author: John C. Maxwell
Quote.QuoteValue: Your attitude towards failure determines your altitude after failure

Quote.Author: John C. Maxwell
Quote.QuoteValue: A minute of thought is greater than an hour of talk

Quote.Author: John C. Maxwell
Quote.QuoteValue: Leaders must be close enough to relate to others, but far enough ahead to motivate them

Quote.Author: John C. Maxwell
Quote.QuoteValue: Family and friendships are two of the greatest facilitators of happiness

Quote.Author: John C. Maxwell
Quote.QuoteValue: Without failure there is no achievement

Quote.Author: John C. Maxwell
Quote.QuoteValue: People buy into the leader before they buy into the vision

Quote.Author: John C. Maxwell
Quote.QuoteValue: Enjoyment is an incredible energizer to the human spirit

Quote.Author: John F. Kennedy
Quote.QuoteValue: If we cannot now end our differences, at least we can help make the world safe for diversity

Quote.Author: John F. Kennedy
Quote.QuoteValue: The goal of education is the advancement of knowledge and the dissemination of truth

Quote.Author: John F. Kennedy
Quote.QuoteValue: Leadership and learning are indispensable to each other

Quote.Author: John F. Kennedy
Quote.QuoteValue: Things do not happen. Things are made to happen

Quote.Author: John F. Kennedy
Quote.QuoteValue: Those who make peaceful revolution impossible will make violent revolution inevitable

Quote.Author: John F. Kennedy
Quote.QuoteValue: Forgive your enemies, but never forget their names

Quote.Author: John F. Kennedy
Quote.QuoteValue: My fellow Americans, ask not what your country can do for you, ask what you can do for your country

Quote.Author: John F. Kennedy
Quote.QuoteValue: Efforts and courage are not enough without purpose and direction

Quote.Author: John F. Kennedy
Quote.QuoteValue: Conformity is the jailer of freedom and the enemy of growth

Quote.Author: John F. Kennedy
Quote.QuoteValue: If a free society cannot help the many who are poor, it cannot save the few who are rich

Quote.Author: John Muir
Quote.QuoteValue: In every walk with nature one receives far more than he seeks

Quote.Author: John Muir
Quote.QuoteValue: The clearest way into the Universe is through a forest wilderness

Quote.Author: John Muir
Quote.QuoteValue: The power of imagination makes us infinite

Quote.Author: John Muir
Quote.QuoteValue: The mountains are calling and I must go

Quote.Author: John Muir
Quote.QuoteValue: When we try to pick out anything by itself, we find it hitched to everything else in the universe

Quote.Author: John Muir
Quote.QuoteValue: How glorious a greeting the sun gives the mountains!

Quote.Author: John Muir
Quote.QuoteValue: Climb the mountains and get their good tidings

Quote.Author: John Muir
Quote.QuoteValue: Sheep, like people, are ungovernable when hungry

Quote.Author: John Muir
Quote.QuoteValue: To the lover of wilderness, Alaska is one of the most wonderful countries in the world

Quote.Author: John Muir
Quote.QuoteValue: Of all the mountain ranges I have climbed, I like the Sierra Nevada the best

Quote.Author: John Wooden
Quote.QuoteValue: The most important thing in the world is family and love

Quote.Author: John Wooden
Quote.QuoteValue: Talent is God given. Be humble. Fame is man-given. Be grateful. Conceit is self-given. Be careful

Quote.Author: John Wooden
Quote.QuoteValue: It's the little details that are vital. Little things make big things happen

Quote.Author: John Wooden
Quote.QuoteValue: Whatever you do in life, surround yourself with smart people who'll argue with you

Quote.Author: John Wooden
Quote.QuoteValue: Today is the only day. Yesterday is gone

Quote.Author: John Wooden
Quote.QuoteValue: Winning takes talent, to repeat takes character

Quote.Author: John Wooden
Quote.QuoteValue: Don't give up on your dreams, or your dreams will give up on you

Quote.Author: John Wooden
Quote.QuoteValue: It's not so important who starts the game but who finishes it

Quote.Author: John Wooden
Quote.QuoteValue: Don't let making a living prevent you from making a life

Quote.Author: John Wooden
Quote.QuoteValue: Failure is not fatal, but failure to change might be

Quote.Author: Joseph Campbell
Quote.QuoteValue: We must let go of the life we have planned, so as to accept the one that is waiting for us

Quote.Author: Joseph Campbell
Quote.QuoteValue: Find a place inside where there's joy, and the joy will burn out the pain

Quote.Author: Joseph Campbell
Quote.QuoteValue: A hero is someone who has given his or her life to something bigger than oneself

Quote.Author: Joseph Campbell
Quote.QuoteValue: Follow your bliss and the universe will open doors where there were only walls

Quote.Author: Joseph Campbell
Quote.QuoteValue: The privilege of a lifetime is being who you are

Quote.Author: Joseph Campbell
Quote.QuoteValue: Your life is the fruit of your own doing. You have no one to blame but yourself

Quote.Author: Joseph Campbell
Quote.QuoteValue: Your sacred space is where you can find yourself again and again

Quote.Author: Joseph Campbell
Quote.QuoteValue: Opportunities to find deeper powers within ourselves come when life seems most challenging

Quote.Author: Joseph Campbell
Quote.QuoteValue: The big question is whether you are going to be able to say a hearty yes to your adventure

Quote.Author: Joseph Campbell
Quote.QuoteValue: Love is a friendship set to music

Quote.Author: Kanye West
Quote.QuoteValue: I feel like I'm too busy writing history to read it

Quote.Author: Kanye West
Quote.QuoteValue: Keep your nose out the sky, keep your heart to god, and keep your face to the raising sun

Quote.Author: Kanye West
Quote.QuoteValue: Would you believe in what you believe in if you were the only one who believed it?

Quote.Author: Kanye West
Quote.QuoteValue: Nothing in life is promised except death

Quote.Author: Kanye West
Quote.QuoteValue: Nobody can tell me where I can and can't go

Quote.Author: Kanye West
Quote.QuoteValue: I know I got angels watchin me from the other side

Quote.Author: Kanye West
Quote.QuoteValue: I will go down as the voice of this generation, of this decade, I will be the loudest voice

Quote.Author: Kanye West
Quote.QuoteValue: I am Warhol. I am the No. 1 most impactful artist of our generation. I am Shakespeare in the flesh

Quote.Author: Kanye West
Quote.QuoteValue: Fashion breaks my heart

Quote.Author: Kanye West
Quote.QuoteValue: I was never really good at anything except for the ability to learn

Quote.Author: Karl Lagerfeld
Quote.QuoteValue: Black-and-white always looks modern, whatever that word means

Quote.Author: Karl Lagerfeld
Quote.QuoteValue: What I love best in life is new starts

Quote.Author: Karl Lagerfeld
Quote.QuoteValue: The importance of logo into today's fashion is un! be! Lievable!

Quote.Author: Karl Lagerfeld
Quote.QuoteValue: I never look at my watch when I'm sketching!

Quote.Author: Karl Lagerfeld
Quote.QuoteValue: If there's something dangerous, sauces are dangerous for the body

Quote.Author: Karl Lagerfeld
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't care if people I admire criticize me because their opinion is valuable to me

Quote.Author: Karl Lagerfeld
Quote.QuoteValue: Don't dress to kill, dress to survive

Quote.Author: Karl Lagerfeld
Quote.QuoteValue: I love to watch times change!

Quote.Author: Karl Lagerfeld
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm born with a pencil in my hand. I did lots of sketching

Quote.Author: Karl Lagerfeld
Quote.QuoteValue: I eat fish, three times a week meat, and if not yogurt, something like this and it rarely continues

Quote.Author: Karl Marx
Quote.QuoteValue: History repeats itself, first as tragedy, second as farce

Quote.Author: Karl Marx
Quote.QuoteValue: The only antidote to mental suffering is physical pain

Quote.Author: Karl Marx
Quote.QuoteValue: The production of too many useful things results in too many useless people

Quote.Author: Karl Marx
Quote.QuoteValue: From each according to his abilities, to each according to his needs

Quote.Author: Karl Marx
Quote.QuoteValue: Social progress can be measured by the social position of the female sex

Quote.Author: Karl Marx
Quote.QuoteValue: The ruling ideas of each age have ever been the ideas of its ruling class

Quote.Author: Karl Marx
Quote.QuoteValue: Nothing can have value without being an object of utility

Quote.Author: Karl Marx
Quote.QuoteValue: Reason has always existed, but not always in a reasonable form

Quote.Author: Karl Marx
Quote.QuoteValue: The theory of Communism may be summed up in one sentence: Abolish all private property

Quote.Author: Karl Marx
Quote.QuoteValue: The history of all previous societies has been the history of class struggles

Quote.Author: Karl Pilkington
Quote.QuoteValue: I'd rather live in a cave with a view of a palace than live in a palace with a view of a cave

Quote.Author: Karl Pilkington
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not that lazy, but I don't need that much money. I lead a fairly simple life

Quote.Author: Karl Pilkington
Quote.QuoteValue: People who live in a glass house have to answer the door

Quote.Author: Karl Pilkington
Quote.QuoteValue: I was impressed by the Taj Mahal. A good bit of work, well looked after, worth paying money to see

Quote.Author: Karl Pilkington
Quote.QuoteValue: But I'm not an idiot. At the end of the day, I've learned a lot

Quote.Author: Karl Pilkington
Quote.QuoteValue: A slug is always on its own. It's a lonely insect

Quote.Author: Karl Pilkington
Quote.QuoteValue: It would be spiteful to put a Jellyfish in a trifle

Quote.Author: Karl Pilkington
Quote.QuoteValue: I found that being with happy positive people annoys me

Quote.Author: Karl Pilkington
Quote.QuoteValue: I just sort of go along and say what I think -and that's all you can do in life, really

Quote.Author: Karl Pilkington
Quote.QuoteValue: People eat duck and you think, well, we've got loads of chickens, leave the ducks alone!

Quote.Author: Keanu Reeves
Quote.QuoteValue: Falling in love and having a relationship are two different things

Quote.Author: Keanu Reeves
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm sorry my existence is not very noble or sublime

Quote.Author: Keanu Reeves
Quote.QuoteValue: The simple act of paying attention can take you a long way

Quote.Author: Keanu Reeves
Quote.QuoteValue: Grief changes shape, but it never ends

Quote.Author: Keanu Reeves
Quote.QuoteValue: When the people you love are gone, you're alone

Quote.Author: Keanu Reeves
Quote.QuoteValue: When I don't feel free and can't do what I want I just react. I go against it

Quote.Author: Keanu Reeves
Quote.QuoteValue: I try not to think about my life. I have no life. I need therapy

Quote.Author: Keanu Reeves
Quote.QuoteValue: It's fun to be hopelessly in love. It's dangerous, but it's fun

Quote.Author: Keanu Reeves
Quote.QuoteValue: I believe in love at first sight. You want that connection, and then you want some problems

Quote.Author: Keanu Reeves
Quote.QuoteValue: I just felt that if I went into Speed 2, I just... wouldn't have come up out of the water

Quote.Author: Keith Richards
Quote.QuoteValue: You've got the sun, you've got the moon, and you've got the Rolling Stones

Quote.Author: Keith Richards
Quote.QuoteValue: Let me be clear about this. I don't have a drug problem. I have a police problem

Quote.Author: Keith Richards
Quote.QuoteValue: I look for ambiguity when I'm writing because life is ambiguous

Quote.Author: Keith Richards
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always been suspicious of TV, I've always found music and video to be an unhappy marriage

Quote.Author: Keith Richards
Quote.QuoteValue: It's great to be here. It's great to be anywhere

Quote.Author: Keith Richards
Quote.QuoteValue: I mean some doctor told me I had six months to live and I went to their funeral

Quote.Author: Keith Richards
Quote.QuoteValue: Everyone talks about rock these days; the problem is they forget about the roll

Quote.Author: Keith Richards
Quote.QuoteValue: I have no idea what the audience makes of me

Quote.Author: Keith Richards
Quote.QuoteValue: The only things Mick and I disagree about is the band, the music and what we do

Quote.Author: Keith Richards
Quote.QuoteValue: It's an addiction... and addiction is something I should know something about

Quote.Author: Kendrick Lamar
Quote.QuoteValue: If I'm gonna tell a real story, I'm gonna start with my name

Quote.Author: Kendrick Lamar
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm constantly thinking

Quote.Author: Kendrick Lamar
Quote.QuoteValue: It's easy to forget who you are

Quote.Author: Kendrick Lamar
Quote.QuoteValue: I can't help the way you was born if you was gay

Quote.Author: Kendrick Lamar
Quote.QuoteValue: I like to let things breathe

Quote.Author: Kendrick Lamar
Quote.QuoteValue: I always tell people that if I move anywhere it would be Toronto

Quote.Author: Kendrick Lamar
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't want to be something that just comes and goes

Quote.Author: Kendrick Lamar
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm selfish

Quote.Author: Kendrick Lamar
Quote.QuoteValue: It's a great, great experience to finally get the reception that you know you rightfully deserve

Quote.Author: Kendrick Lamar
Quote.QuoteValue: God to me is love

Quote.Author: Kevin Hart
Quote.QuoteValue: Men are like lions. We hunt

Quote.Author: Kevin Hart
Quote.QuoteValue: My main goal is to be a self-made man and have control over what's mine

Quote.Author: Kevin Hart
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't care how busy I am - I will always make time for what's most important to me

Quote.Author: Kevin Hart
Quote.QuoteValue: A reputation as a hard worker is a good reputation to have

Quote.Author: Kevin Hart
Quote.QuoteValue: The day you stop doing the small things is the day you think you're above everybody else

Quote.Author: Kevin Hart
Quote.QuoteValue: It's a well-known fact that tall people are evil

Quote.Author: Kevin Hart
Quote.QuoteValue: Being humble matters

Quote.Author: Kevin Hart
Quote.QuoteValue: I love women with attitude

Quote.Author: Kevin Hart
Quote.QuoteValue: I stayed true to my dreams and, eventually, they came true

Quote.Author: Kevin Hart
Quote.QuoteValue: I love soft-cotton white T-shirts

Quote.Author: Kevin Spacey
Quote.QuoteValue: Sometimes it's the crazy people who turn out to be not so crazy

Quote.Author: Kevin Spacey
Quote.QuoteValue: You have to always be ready, always be alive, and always be willing to move in a new direction

Quote.Author: Kevin Spacey
Quote.QuoteValue: Life's all about perceptions

Quote.Author: Kevin Spacey
Quote.QuoteValue: We're all victims of our own hubris at times

Quote.Author: Kevin Spacey
Quote.QuoteValue: I have always believed that the risk takers are eventually rewarded

Quote.Author: Kevin Spacey
Quote.QuoteValue: I became a bit of a jerk. A kind of a nasty jerk

Quote.Author: Kevin Spacey
Quote.QuoteValue: I accept the fact that some things don't go the way you hope

Quote.Author: Kevin Spacey
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm used to people thinking I'm nuts. And you know what? I kind of love it

Quote.Author: Kevin Spacey
Quote.QuoteValue: What's my favourite book? It changes all the time
